question: Show all casting directors and location scouts whose salary equals $80,000.
sql_query1:
SELECT Casting_Directors.name
FROM Casting_Directors
WHERE Casting_Directors.Salary = 80000.0
UNION
SELECT Location_Scouts.name
FROM Location_Scouts
WHERE Location_Scouts.Salary = 80000.0
sql_query2:
SELECT Casting_Directors.name
FROM Casting_Directors
UNION
SELECT Location_Scouts.name
FROM Location_Scouts
WHERE Location_Scouts.Salary = 80000.0
interpretation1: Can you display both casting directors and location scouts whose salary is $80,000?
interpretation2: List all casting directors and also show location scouts with a salary of $80,000.
